id: Bernie Sanders wants to see Trump lose in 2020
paragraph: By Emma Seslowsky, CNNUpdated 6:34 PM ET, Wed October 24, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)Sen. Bernie Sanders "wants to make sure that Trump is beaten in 2020," according to his 2016 campaign manager, Jeff Weaver.
